name: Duplicati
description: Feature-rich backup client with web interface supporting multiple storage backends.
author: StumpfWorks
compose:
version: '3.8'

services:
  duplicati:
    image: lscr.io/linuxserver/duplicati:latest
    container_name: duplicati
    restart: unless-stopped
    environment:
      - PUID={{PUID}}
      - PGID={{PGID}}
      - TZ={{TZ}}
    ports:
      - "{{PORT}}:8200"
    volumes:
      - {{CONFIG_PATH}}:/config
      - {{BACKUP_SOURCE}}:/source:ro
    labels:
      - "com.stumpfworks.app=duplicati"
      - "com.stumpfworks.category=backup"

notes: Supports S3, Google Drive, OneDrive, and more
Mount additional volumes as needed for backup sources
Schedule automatic backups via web interface
